publications.title: AI-Driven Cybersecurity: A Comprehensive Survey on Machine Learning Applications in Security
publications.venue: IEEE Transactions on Information Forensics and Security
publications.abstract: This comprehensive survey examines the integration of artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques in cybersecurity applications, focusing on threat detection, vulnerability assessment, and automated defense mechanisms.

publications.title: Explainable AI for Security Operations Centers: Enhancing Trust in Automated Threat Detection
publications.venue: ACM Conference on Computer and Communications Security
publications.abstract: We present a novel framework for implementing explainable AI in security operations centers, addressing the critical need for transparency in automated threat detection systems.

publications.title: Blockchain-Enhanced Security for Vehicular Ad-Hoc Networks: A Hybrid AI Approach
publications.abstract: This paper proposes a novel hybrid approach combining blockchain technology and artificial intelligence for securing vehicular ad-hoc networks against various attack vectors.

publications.title: LLM-SHIELD: Large Language Model Powered Cyber Defense Framework
publications.abstract: We introduce LLM-SHIELD, a comprehensive cyber defense framework that leverages large language models for real-time threat intelligence and automated incident response.

publications.title: Secure Protocol Design for Industrial Internet of Things: A Comprehensive Analysis
publications.abstract: This work presents a comprehensive analysis of secure protocol design challenges in Industrial IoT environments and proposes novel solutions for critical infrastructure protection.
